message:
The following service(s) have been created in your project: ${NAME}.

annotations.description: Exposes and load balances the application pods
Keeps track of changes in the application image
Defines how to build the application
Defines how to deploy the application server

parameters.name: NAME
parameters.description: The name assigned to all of the frontend objects defined in this template.

parameters.name: NAMESPACE
parameters.description: The OpenShift Namespace where the ImageStream resides.

parameters.name: SOURCE_REPOSITORY_URL
parameters.description: The URL of the repository with your application source code.

parameters.name: SOURCE_REPOSITORY_REF
parameters.description: Set this to a branch name, tag or other ref of your repository if you are not using the default branch.

parameters.name: GITHUB_WEBHOOK_SECRET
parameters.description: A secret string used to configure the GitHub webhook.

parameters.name: CONTEXT_DIR
parameters.description: Set this to the relative path to your project if it is not in the root of your repository.

parameters.name: MEMORY_LIMIT
parameters.description: Maximum amount of memory the PHP container can use.

parameters.name: APPLICATION_DOMAIN
parameters.description: The exposed hostname that will route to the PHP service, if left blank a value will be defaulted.

parameters.name: ERROR_REPORTING
parameters.description: Informs PHP of which errors, warnings and notices you would like it to take action for.

parameters.name: DISPLAY_ERRORS
parameters.description: Controls whether or not and where PHP will output errors, notices and warnings.

parameters.name: DISPLAY_STARTUP_ERRORS
parameters.description: Cause display errors which occur during PHP's startup sequence to be handled separately from display errors.

parameters.name: TRACK_ERRORS
parameters.description: Store the last error/warning message in $php_errormsg (boolean).

parameters.name: HTML_ERRORS
parameters.description: Link errors to documentation related to the error.

parameters.name: INCLUDE_PATH
parameters.description: Path for PHP source files.

parameters.name: SESSION_PATH
parameters.description: Location for session data files.

parameters.name: SHORT_OPEN_TAG
parameters.description: Determines whether or not PHP will recognize code between <? and ?> tags.

parameters.name: DOCUMENTROOT
parameters.description: Path that defines the DocumentRoot for your application (ie. /public).

parameters.name: OPCACHE_MEMORY_CONSUMPTION
parameters.description: The OPcache shared memory storage size.

parameters.name: OPCACHE_REVALIDATE_FREQ
parameters.description: How often to check script timestamps for updates, in seconds. 0 will result in OPcache checking for updates on every request.

parameters.name: HTTPD_START_SERVERS
parameters.description: The StartServers directive sets the number of child server processes created on startup.

parameters.name: COMPOSER_MIRROR
parameters.description: Adds a custom composer repository mirror URL to composer configuration.
